name: @fadroma/scrt
description: Fadroma support for Secret Network. Provides a SecretJS-based implementation of the base classes in @fadroma/agent to operate smart contracts on the Secret Network.

scripts.release: time sh -c 'pnpm check && pnpm cov all && ubik release --access public --otp 000000'
scripts.release:fast: time sh -c 'pnpm check && ubik release --access public --otp 000000'
